}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Model: HD Pro Webcam C920, M/N: V-U0028, :P/N: 860-000334 (''QuickCam''), P/N: 210-001063
*{{WPLink|Logitech}} *[https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/news/teardown-tuesday-logitech-hd-pro-webcam-c920/ ''Teardown'' on '''AllAboutCircuits'''] (PCB images)
{{See also|Logitech|List of Camera Devices}} __NOTOC__ * http://www.ideasonboard.org/uvc/ * http://webcam-osx.sourceforge.net/cameras/index.php * [https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupportComponentsMultimediaWebCamerasLogitech Hardware Support Multimedia WebCameras - Logitech]
===Specifications=== *Full HD 1080p video calling (up to 1920x1080 pixels) :with the latest version of Skype for Windows *720p HD video calling (up to 1280x720 pixels) :with supported clients *Full HD video recording (up to 1920x1080 pixels) *Full HD glass lens with precise autofocus *Maximum Resolution: 1080p/720p (30fps) *H.264 video compression
